# JwtTokenBuilder.CloneBuilder method

Creates a new token builder instance by cloning the current configuration.

```csharp
public JwtTokenBuilder CloneBuilder()
```

## Return Value

A new [`JwtTokenBuilder`](../JwtTokenBuilder.md) instance with the same configuration.
